page.title: 02EMPLOYMENT IN HOCKLEY.
page.content: THE AREA BEING SURVEYED HAS A SERIES OF LIGHT INDUSTRIAL UNITS. THESE EMPLOY SMALL NUMBERS OF PEOPLE WITHIN PRE-BUILT FACTORY UNITS AND THEN LEASED TO THE MANUFACTURER. THE BEST KNOWN FACTORY WITHIN THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE BEING {EVER READY}BATTERIES. HOWEVER CLOSE TO THE INDUSTRIAL ESTATE THERE IS THE {GUINNESS BROTHERS} FACTORY WHICH PRODUCES SNOOKER TABLES. THESE BEING SOLD THROUGHOUT THE COUNTRY AND ALSO EXPORTED. A NUMBER OF PEOPLE LIVING IN HOCKLEY COMMUTE TO LONDON. THIS IS A GROWING FEATURE OF THE POPULATION WITHIN THE AREA AND IS EXPECTED TO GROW AS THE TOWN CONTINUES TO DEVELOP.
